data.title: New Age
meta_keywords: Most Popular Outspoken English Daily Newpaper in Bangladesh
data.text:
NU VC resigns

The vice-chancellor of National University, Professor Md Mashiur Rahman, resigned from his post on Sunday.

After around one month, the metro rail services are scheduled to be resumed on August 17.
